title: SocialNav: Training Human-Inspired Foundation Model for Socially-Aware Embodied Navigation
summary: Embodied navigation that adheres to social norms remains an open research challenge. Our \textbf{SocialNav} is a foundational model for socially-aware navigation with a hierarchical "brain-action" architecture, capable of understanding high-level social norms and generating low-level, socially compliant trajectories.
